# passgr

Description. 
The package passgr is used to:
	- generate passwords

## Installation

Use the package manager [pip](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/) to install passgr

```bash
pip install passgr
```

## Usage

```python
from passgr import pass_generator
pass_generator.my_function()
```
